languages.text: "Я бы тебя прикончил{mf||а}, но надеюсь, что Комморра будет к тебе более жестока, чем могу быть я".
"I would end you here and now were it not for the hope that Commorragh would be more cruel to you than anything I could punish you with."
languages.original_text: "Я бы тебя прикончил{mf||а}, но надеюсь, что Комморра будет к тебе более жестока, чем могу быть я".

traits.locale_text: "I would end you here and now were it not for the hope that Commorragh will be more cruel to your than anything I could punish you with."
"I would end you here and now were it not for the hope that Commorragh will be more cruel to your than anything I could punish you with."
"I would end you here and now were it not for the hope that Commorragh would be more cruel to you than anything I could punish you with."
"I would end you here and now were it not for the hope that Commorragh would be more cruel to you than anything I could punish you with."
"I would end you here and now were it not for the hope that Commorragh would be more cruel to you than anything I could punish you with."
"I would end you here and now were it not for the hope that Commorragh would be more cruel to you than anything I could punish you with."

languages.text: « Je vous achèverais sur place si je n'avais pas l'espoir que Commorragh vous inflige une mort bien plus cruelle que celle que je serais capable de vous faire subir. »
languages.original_text: "I would end you here and now were it not for the hope that Commorragh would be more cruel to you than anything I could punish you with."

traits.locale_text: Je vous achèverais sur place si je n'avais pas l'espoir que Commorragh vous inflige une mort bien plus cruelle que celle que je serais capable de vous faire subir. »

languages.text: “我真的很想在这里亲手了结你。不过，科摩罗能给你的惩罚，比我能想到的一切惩罚都更加残酷，那就这样吧。”
languages.original_text: "I would end you here and now were it not for the hope that Commorragh would be more cruel to you than anything I could punish you with."

traits.locale_text: “我真的很想在这里亲手了结你。不过，科摩罗能给你的惩罚，比我能想到的一切惩罚都更加残酷，那就这样吧。”

languages.text: 「ここで殺してやろうと思ったがやめたよ。私が与えるどんな罰より、お前にとってはコモラフ行きのほうが過酷だろうからな」
languages.original_text: "I would end you here and now were it not for the hope that Commorragh would be more cruel to you than anything I could punish you with."

traits.locale_text: 「ここで殺してやろうと思ったがやめたよ。私が与えるどんな罰より、お前にとってはコモラフ行きのほうが過酷だろうからな」

languages.text: "Ich würde Euch hier und jetzt töten, aber ich hege die Hoffnung, dass Commorragh grausamer zu Euch sein wird als alles, was ich Euch antun kann."
languages.original_text: "I would end you here and now were it not for the hope that Commorragh would be more cruel to you than anything I could punish you with."

traits.locale_text: "Ich würde Euch hier und jetzt töten, aber ich hege die Hoffnung, dass Commorragh grausamer zu Euch sein wird als alles, was ich Euch antun kann."

languages.text: «Acabaría contigo aquí y ahora de no ser por la esperanza de que Commorragh te depare más crueldad que ningún castigo que yo pueda imponerte».
languages.original_text: "I would end you here and now were it not for the hope that Commorragh would be more cruel to you than anything I could punish you with."

traits.locale_text: «Acabaría contigo aquí y ahora de no ser por la esperanza de que Commorragh te depare más crueldad que ningún castigo que yo pueda imponerte».

languages.text: "Commorragh'ın seni, benim cezalandırabileceğimden çok daha zalimce cezalandırmasını ummasaydım... Acınası hayatına burada son verirdim."
languages.original_text: "I would end you here and now were it not for the hope that Commorragh would be more cruel to you than anything I could punish you with."

traits.locale_text: "Commorragh'ın seni, benim cezalandırabileceğimden çok daha zalimce cezalandırmasını ummasaydım... Acınası hayatına burada son verirdim."
